info.title: Client Action
info.description: Streamlined OpenAPI specification for Client Action creation API only. This configuration is optimized for automation and reusability.

post.description: Creates a new client action in the portal with specified component, UI mapping, conditions, and module associations.

get.description: With the help of this API, we can able to call get all client actions in a portal.

schema.description: The number of custom buttons that need to be fetched.
The starting index number from which the custom buttons should be fetched.
The locations where the components can be rendered or shown.
The modules where the actions can be performed.

get.description: With the help of this API, we can able to get client action by its ID.

patch.description: Updates an existing client action in the portal with specified component, UI mapping, conditions, and module associations.

delete.description: With the help of this API, we can delete a client action in a portal.

get.description: With the help of this API, we can get all available component definitions with their properties, events, and locations.

agentData.description: Agent information including personal details and metadata

photoURL.description: Profile photo URL of the agent

eventMappingPayload.description: Defines event mapping configuration for UI components

sourceEvent.description: The event triggered by the component or user interaction (e.g., ACTION_ICON#CLICKED)

targetEvent.description: The event that should be triggered in response to the source event (e.g., TARGET#EVENT)

payloadValueMapping.description: Data passed to the target event for execution. Must contain at least one key-value pair.

eventMappingResponse.description: Event mapping response structure with metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for the event mapping

sourceEvent.description: The event triggered by the component

targetEvent.description: The target event to be triggered

fieldName.description: Name of the field for the condition (e.g., record.email)

anyOf.description: Full condition configuration with fields and pattern

uiComponentMappingPayload.description: UI component mapping configuration for client action

component.description: Valid registered component name for UI rendering

propertiesValueMapping.description: UI component properties like labels and icons. Must contain at least one property.

eventMappings.description: Optional event mappings for component interactions

uiComponentMappingResponse.description: UI component mapping response with metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for the UI component mapping

createClientActionPayload.description: Payload structure for creating a new client action

location.description: Location where the component can be rendered

modules.description: Desk modules where this action is applicable

clientActionResponse.description: Response structure for client action operations

id.description: Unique identifier for the client action (response only)

conditions.description: Condition configuration (required field, can be null or valid condition object)

conditionId.description: Unique identifier for the condition (required field, can be null)

updateUiComponentMappingPayload.description: UI component mapping payload for update operations. The 'id' field is MANDATORY and must be provided to identify the existing UI component mapping to update.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UI component mapping (MANDATORY for updates - cannot be null or empty)

component.description: Valid registered component name for UI rendering

propertiesValueMapping.description: UI component properties like labels and icons. Must contain at least one property.

eventMappings.description: Optional event mappings for component interactions

updateClientActionPayload.description: Payload structure for updating an existing client action. The uiComponentMapping.id field is MANDATORY and must match an existing UI component mapping.

location.description: Location where the component can be rendered

modules.description: Desk modules where this action is applicable

maxLength.description: Maximum length allowed for the property

allowedComponents.description: List of allowed components in this location

clientActionId.name: clientActionId
clientActionId.description: Unique ID of the client action

schema.description: Unique identifier for the client action

createClientActionPayload.description: Request body for creating a new client action

basicClientAction.summary: Basic client action with required fields
basicClientAction.description: Example of a minimal client action configuration

minimalClientAction.summary: Minimal client action with mandatory fields only

clientActionWithEmptyConditions.summary: Client action with empty conditions object
clientActionWithEmptyConditions.description: Example showing empty conditions object results in conditionId: null and conditions: {}

clientActionWithNullConditions.description: Example showing null conditions results in conditionId: null and conditions: null

updateClientActionRequestBody.description: Request body for updating an existing client action

updateClientActionExample.summary: Update existing client action with mandatory ID
updateClientActionExample.description: Example of updating a client action with MANDATORY uiComponentMapping.id field. The ID must reference an existing UI component mapping.

updateCustomModuleExample.description: Example showing update. This matches error scenarios but with required ID field.

successfulCreation.description: Example response after creating a client action

emptyConditionsResponse.description: Example response when conditions was sent as empty object {}

nullConditionsResponse.description: Example response when conditions was sent as null

successfulUpdate.description: Example response after updating a client action

getClientActionResponse.description: Successful get client action by ID response

successfulGet.description: Example response when getting a client action by ID

getClientActionsResponse.description: Successful get all client actions response

schema.description: Array of client actions. Returns empty array if no records match filtering parameters.

successfulGetAll.description: Example response when multiple client actions are found

emptyResponse.description: Example response when no records match the filtering parameters
